Title: Relates to the amount of surplus funds which may be retained by a school district
Summary: Relates to the amount of surplus funds which may be retained by a school district; establishes surplus funds for the 2024-2025 school year through the 2028-2029 school year shall mean any operating funds in excess of 8% of the current school year budget.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the amount of surplus funds which may be retained by a school district; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
